edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2010.invasion.iface
Interface InvasionModel

public interface InvasionModel

This interface represents the behavioral contract of a model for the Invasion game. An implementation of this interface contains the logic of Invasion as well as the state for a specific Invasion game.

Method Summary

          Adds a new listener to this model.

Method Detail

getCurrentPlayer

Player getCurrentPlayer()
Determines which player is currently moving.

Returns:
The current player.

getPieceOwner

Player getPieceOwner(Location location)
Determines the player who controls the piece at the specified location.

Parameters:
location - The location for which a piece is desired.
Returns:
The player who owns a piece at that location. Returns null if the location is empty or if the location is not on the board.

getWinner

Player getWinner()
Determines which player has won the game.

Returns:
The player who won the game or null if neither player has yet won the game.

endTurn

void endTurn()
             throws IllegalMoveException
Indicates that the current player would like to end his or her turn. It is only legal for a player to end his or her turn if he or she has moved exactly one piece at least once.

Throws:
IllegalMoveException - If this is not legal.

move

void move(Location currentLocation,
          Location newLocation)
          throws IllegalMoveException
Indicates that the current player would like to move the piece at the given location to a new location.

Parameters:
currentLocation - The current location of the piece.
newLocation - The location to which the player wishes to move the piece.
Throws:
IllegalMoveException - If this move is not legal.

addListener

void addListener(InvasionModelListener listener)
Adds a new listener to this model. This model will now report any events that occur to this listener as well as any others it has received.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to add to this model.

removeListener

void removeListener(InvasionModelListener listener)
Removes a listener from this model. This model will no longer report events that occur to the specified listener. Any other listeners which have been added to this model but not yet removed will still receive events.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to remove from this model.
